attributes.action: insist that the NMC reduce registration costs for nurses to be in line with annual pay "rises"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the NMC has changed its registration to annual collection now and has increased the cost by 90% at the same time. I argue that the cost be only increased by a maximum of 2.5% or whatever the future annual pay "increase" for nurses is.
